name: Fragment: Contours of a Dream
description:
Fragments is an experimental series of little game/side-projects which are freely can be anything.

Contours of a Dream is a little remake of original game which was released in 2015 with changes aiming it to be an overall better experience.

Explore the monolith towers among the misty meadow and reveal the mystery...

Game will run in borderless mode and will use your desktop resolution and refresh rate.

System requirements:

  • 64-bit Windows PC that can run UE4 on high settings
  • ~250 Mb free disk space

The game is free, but donations are welcome.
